entities.description: The consumption of alcoholic beverages by individuals.
The use or misuse of computers and related equipment.
The use of illegal drugs or controlled substances.
The raw count of survey respondents for each category without any weight adjustment.
The proportion of survey respondents within each category.
Individuals suspected of consuming substances or using equipment as listed.

relationships.description: Indicates that the offender is suspected of using alcohol.
Indicates that the offender is suspected of using computer equipment.
Indicates that the offender is suspected of using drugs or narcotics.
The raw count of individuals in each category.
The proportion of individuals within each category.
